Your Result: Paleoconservative
你的结果：原教旨保守主义者。

Paleoconservatism is a neologism that intends to separate the Old Right from the New Right
, who are also known as neoconservatives. Paleocons generally support the autonomy of the family, restrictions on immigration, a non-interventionist or even isolationist foreign policy, an expansion of the role of religious values in government, a decentralization of power within government, and opposition to same-sex marriage and abortion. However, paleoconservatives are a diverse group, especially when it comes to economics. While most paleocons support protectionist capitalism, others oppose capitalism entirely, supporting distributism and producerism instead.



“原教旨保守主义”是一个旨在区分新、老右派的新词。也就是我们熟知的“新保守主义”。原教旨主义者经常支持家族形式的自制，限制移民，信奉不干涉主义甚至是孤立外交主义，政府价值观受宗教影响，政府权力下放，反对同性婚姻和堕胎。然而，原教旨保守主义者的构成多元，特别是经济领域，大多数原教旨主义者支持贸易保护政策，其它的包括反对极端资本主义，支持分产主义（我没支持）和生产者主义.
